post.body: THat was me, dear :) http://twitpic.com/rnwa - Hilarious pic about the Big 3 "bailout"
U sure are talkative today :)
I would LOVE to go to SXSWi - how did you win that?
I nominate @girlfriendology for a Shorty Award in #women because her blog is dedicated to furthering female friendship.
Never had braces, and never had wisdom teeth :) dentist visits to me are a piece of cake so I don't mind them!
I made it to the dropoff place with 8 minutes to spare :) tnx for offering to help!
I nominate @jpostman for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia because he's got a grasp on socmed in the PR world!
It's prolly all worthless knowledge at any rate :) but it's fun!
Tnx :) he explained that to me earlier! Your av is a little freaky...
I might be in ATL this weekend!!
Oh! There's also TweetClouds, TwitGraph, and Twitterank for that kind of stuff.
If I didn't send out cards, I would catch a lot of crap from my family :) some of them it's the only time we correspond!
LOL. Cowbell.... I gotta fever....and the prescription calls for more cowbell!
I've posted already! :) http://www.researchgoddess.com
I think this was meant 4 u: @prblog Tommy can you hear me now. ... http://tinyurl.com/5wa5xr (Twitterfone experiment)
That's where my thoughts went, to ppl there with little kids. How can you possibly explain that to them...
Yeah, about 30 ft from it when it happened.
It was surreal.At first I thought it was part of the performance but quickly realized it wasn't. I'm not sure how 2 feel now
@kate_the_great Did you attend last night?
@JustKurt Mutual respect. NEVER pays 2 be pompous with a recruiter tho- the job u don't want today could be the one u need tomorrow
Aren't plugins for hosted Wordpress blogs? I have a forwarding URL to my researchgoddess.wordpress.com site.
Can you let me know if there are any spas in El Paso TX that do manicures for little girls at somewhat reasonable prices?
Jim (@smheadhunter) is a good guy...
Hmmm just checked mine. No bedbugs here!
I refuse to work out tomorrow between 5-7am or any time after 5pm. HECK no.
They will all be at the gym tomorrow, and then for the next 2.5 weeks until about 1/3 will fall off the bandwagon.
I probably did :) well, most of them will take that as a compliment :) I appreciate being called geek, dork, nerd. Badge of honor.
OK then someone asked for snowy holidays...cuz you guys sure got it!
One of you people up there unwisely wished for a white Christmas :)
Agreed. I'd love to take the snip of the conv/ Angie and Nico had regarding "I need someone w/ your...experience on my side"
sadly, I cannot say that...
If it's fashion, try a scrunchie, or mall-hair (http://tinyurl.com/8jmnbt)
something bad from the 90s? Are you talking habits, or fashion?
LOL best search phrase of the day that landed someone on my blog: "I want you." You got me, baby!! :)
PR pros in San Francisco - we're hiring an AD/VP for our Tech practice. Interested? @ or DM me... also hiring an AM in Boston for healthcare
Tnx also, @almacy! RT @researchgoddess, you were nominated by @almacy for a #pr Shorty Award http://bit.ly/rIT2
YES - I finally got an email from my new South African friend - was afraid that she wasn't getting my notes!
TNX JOEL!!!!! RT @jpostman: @shortyawards I nominate @researchgoddess for a Shorty Award in #business
Now listening to Tchaikovsky Pas de Deux, Sugar Plum Fair and Prince Orgead: Coda - even more beautiful!
Listening to Tchaikovsky's Sleeping Beauty Act I: Pas d'action: Rose adagio....beautiful.
#CincyTweetup tomorrow! Just verified, our location WILL be open :) 9 spots left - register today if u haven't! http://snipr.com/7s3a0
I love going to the dentist. They can't seem to believe that I've never had braces...hygienist said today that I have beautiful teeth :)
Couch shopping in Columbus... Fun Sunday afternoon :)
LOL MadTV is hilarious tonight...
LOL @ Tickle Me Emo on MadTV...
NEW video from South Africa! GO Mamelodi 08 - The Kids: http://vimeo.com/2517488
December Tweetup video is posted! http://tinyurl.com/647gmo
Have seriously cut down on the Christmas cards this year. Lots of folks not making the cut...
Doing Xmas cards. Feels weird addressing friends' parents by their 1st names, but I think I'm a little old to still be calling them Mr./Mrs.
Fun times w/ @kristaneher, @girlfriendology, & @TommyTshirt! Tnx for hanging out last night. Today: cleaning my place. boring :(
CANNOT believe I'm up this early on Saturday...
Hanging with @kristaneher and @tommytshirt at the pub rookwood... U should join us!
At the Rookwood Pub w/ @girlfriendology and @kristaneher, come join some cincy blogger chicks!!
HAPPY HOUR TIME: Come for a drink at The Pub Rookwood from 5pm until whenever - Cincinnati! Look for @girlfriendology, @kristaneher, & me!
New Twool, tnx to @paulmatson. Tnx a bunch pal, now I feel like a loser :) TweetWasters: http://tweetwasters.com/researchgoddess
Sometimes working remote on the East Coast for a WC company stinks; my co-workers often forget that I'm 3 hrs ahead & don't schedule accdly
#CincyTweetup my technology is making a racket here...my phone just jingled and freaked out @jwestwood...
Cincinnati tweeps: Come for a drink at The Pub Rookwood from 5pm until whenever, following the #CincyTweetup
Boarding flight to El Paso - going to see my goddaughters for a few days
The woman who fell 25ft last nt at the Awaited performance in Cincy died this mng. Prayers 4 her fam appreciated http://tinyurl.com/cin1217
it never pays to be a jerk to a recruiter. WE REMEMBER. Oh boy do we remember...
for those of you who pray - please send a few extra up 4 the woman who fell 25ft tonight at my church Xmas production:http://snipr.com/8r2pe
RT @jdbridgman: http://obsoleteskills.com/, a full list of skills that we don't need anymore.
RT @almacy: @TechCrunch says, "Death to the Embargo!" http://tinyurl.com/4x223k nice plug for @WaggenerEdstrom, though bad image placement.
Does anyone know how to embed a Vimeo video on to a Wordpress blog?? I cannot figure it out for the life of me...
We're hiring an AM & an AD in Singapore, both need digital exp. Chk both out on Careers w/ @WaggenerEdstrom FB page: http://snipr.com/7beyf
Yummy - I want to sit on THIS Santa's lap.... http://tinyurl.com/3kankj
LAST SOUTH AFRICA VIDEO: All the fun stuff we did! Check it out: http://vimeo.com/2553965
RT @CincyRecruiter: I would definitely call in for that show! Title: Meet Jessica Lee - The Carrie Bradshaw of HR on all things talent
FlipCam users out there: does anyone have a link to a video u could share w/ me? Trying to get an idea of the video quality of the newer one
Anyone w/ little girls? How much do salons typically charge for a manicure for a little girl? Thinking about an activity w/ my goddaughters
PR folks - what are going to be some of the best conferences to attend this year? I'm trying to narrow down some choices...
Wondering if I can get some bailout money? I just saw a sweater I liked, and I "need" it. You know, for business...
Discussing Twitter w/ a new musician friend. He says "I never got into it & it's a shame." I say "it's not for everyone, only dorks like me"
I love having spontaneous cups of coffee with good conversationalists :) Just got back from one...
So, I've now gotten 3 spammy DMs in the past 2 days...
Cincinnati: is the starving artist sale today at the Holiday Inn on Hauck Rd.?
Fantastic - just had a lovely conversation with one of my new friends from South Africa. She is coming to visit in April!!
My prediction: Tony Dungy is going to unleash some major wrath in the locker room b/c of all the penalties in O/T. Objects will be flying...
Chargers should buy the first round for the officials tonight. They practically handed them the game in overtime. Good for Rivers though...
